#summary How to migrate existing pre-1.0.0-RC1 JavaCL/JNA code to JavaCL/BridJ

<table>
<tr>
<th>Regexp pattern</th>
<th>Replace expression in jEdit</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bReductor&lt;(\w*)Buffer&gt;</td><td>"Reductor&lt;" + _1 + "&gt;"</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bCLIntBuffer\b</td><td>CLBuffer&lt;Integer&gt;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bCLCharBuffer\b</td><td>CLBuffer&lt;Character&gt;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bCL(Long|Short|Double|Float|Byte)Buffer\b</td><td>"CLBuffer&lt;" + _1 + "&gt;"</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>
\b(Int|Char|Long|Short|Double|Float|Byte)Buffer\.allocate\(\b</td><td>"Pointer.allocate" + _1 + "s("</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bNIOUtils\.direct(Int|Char|Long|Short|Double|Float|Byte)s\(\b</td><td>"Pointer.allocate" + _1 + "s("</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\b(Int|Char|Long|Short|Double|Float|Byte)Buffer\.wrap\(\b</td><td>"Pointer.pointerTo" + _1 + "s("</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bIntBuffer\b</td><td>Pointer&lt;Integer&gt;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\bCharBuffer\b</td><td>Pointer&lt;Character&gt;</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>\b(Long|Short|Double|Float|Byte)Buffer\b</td><td>"Pointer&lt;" + _1 + "&gt;"</td>
</tr>
</table>
